name: exercises
title: Exercises - Fitness and Workouts
description: Find fitness exercises. Create and do custom workouts
author: arthur_kosten

commands.name: index
commands.title: Find Exercises
commands.description: Find and view exercises, favorite and add to workout

commands.name: createWorkout
commands.title: Create Workout
commands.description: Create a new workout with a list of exercises

commands.name: manageWorkout
commands.title: Manage Workout
commands.description: View workouts, see delete and reorder exercises

commands.name: doWorkout
commands.title: Do Workout
commands.description: Time to Exercise! Do a workout

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
